newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: LITHUANIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 1.
newsitem.headline: LITHUANIA NOON RADIO HEADLINES - APRIL 1.

text.p: Here are the leading headlines from Lithuania's M-1 plus radio station broadcast at noon on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The European commissioner Hans Van Den Broek arrives on Wednesday for a two-day vist to Lithuania to acquaint himself with the country's preparations for EU membership.

- The Liberal Union says it might seek legal action and protest a decision by the election commission which declared the local election results in Svenchionys null and void on the grounds that the Liberal Union bought votes with money.

- A Vilnius court has started proceedings against former Soviet activist Valerie Ivanov on charges of slandering the 13 people who were killed in Vilnius on the night of January 13, 1991, during a Soviet crack-down.
